wikitext.*:
'''KAN''' is a [[Common Eldarin]] root signifying "cry, call aloud".<ref name=PM>{{PM|Shibboleth}}, pp. 361-2</ref>

==Derivatives==

*?[[Primitive Quendian]]:<ref group=note>Not given a designated language name in the source, only said to be "archaic language".</ref> ''kānō''<ref name=PM/>
**[[Quenya]]: ''[[káno]]'' "crier", "herald"<ref name=PM/>
**[[Telerin]]: ''[[cāno]]'' "herald"; ''[[can-]]'' "cry aloud, call" or "to summons or name a person"<ref name=PM/>
**[[Sindarin]]: ''[[can-]]'' "cry out, shout, call"; ''[[caun]]'' "outcry, clamour"<ref name=PM/>
